name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RadioTube - watch Radio songs on YouTubeâ„¢

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to radio stations via YouTube videos. Use Chromecast for MTV experience. Genres: Blues, Country, HipHop, Jazz, Latin, Rock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A brand new way to listen to online radio stations i.e. via YouTube!  Try it now!

RadioTube listens for new songs on your selected radio station and updates your browser tab to the corresponding YouTube video.

Enjoy music more with the best of all worlds of radio, video, browsers and youtube. 
Radio: More choice on stations relative to TV channels, multiple genres available see list below.
Video: Watch as well as listen to the video on your device or TV
Browsers: Leverage browser history to rewind, replay and fast-forward songs.
YouTube: Easy access to video details plus social aspect

Call it a radio to video channel, radio autoplay or music tv lead by radio stations, whatever you want to call it, its a fun new way of watching music videos on YouTube.

With Chromecast the experience is comparable to MTV except you have more control over the music being played i.e. replay, rewind or play another song. 


Supported Radio Stations:
Hot 97, Kiis FM, Z100, 106.7 Lite fm, KTU, BBC Radio 1, iHeart 80s, 90s, iHeartRadio, kshe95, Y98  stations.

Genres : Latest charts, African, Blues, Chinese, Christian, Christmas Carols, Country, Dance, Folk, HipHop, Polish, Indian, International, Jazz, Latin, Metal, Oldies, Pop, Raggae, Rap, RnB, Rock, Russian, Xmas, 80s, 90 and 00s. Slow Jams (RnB) for romantic valentine's songs for valentines day.

More radio stations to come based on demand.
